title: crosssite scripting
extract: Cross-site scripting, also known as XSS, is a type of computer security vulnerability typically found in web applications. XSS enables attackers to inject client-side scripts into web pages viewed by other users.
extract_html: Cross-site scripting, also known as XSS, is a type of computer security vulnerability typically found in web applications. XSS enables attackers to inject client-side scripts into web pages viewed by other users.
